name: Dark Scroll
description:
Dark Scroll is a 2D topdown fighting game. You play as Malukah a hero that fell deep into the Caverns. now you must get out of there again.

Lore:

In the small realm of Kanteer reigns chaos! The dark lord Jödlödlö has taken over the power and banished all the former Heroes into the Caverns of Bwruht - a dangerous location full of Zombies and other Creatures that have not names...

This is where our Story begins...

Our hero, Malukah, fell deep into the Caverns. There he slowly recovered and ventured around... Now he should find maps to open new passages for him.

Team:

  •    Janek
  •    Malte
